text: @RepDougCollins But it's ok to have a sexual predator in the WH who's lied daily about the COVID-19 VIRUS. 123,155 Americans are DEAD because trump didn't act when he should have. You and the rest of the GOP support him and his lies! He, @realDonaldTrump must GO! https://t.co/y8dQuwQrKr
